Articles.Content:
New title: In game achievements/Unlocks: Launch Music

I was launching a while ago and I though about some of the movies about rockets launching and that gave me the idea.

After your first successful (unaided) orbit, a setting would unlock, Enabling Rock and Roll remix of some of the music that is already in the game.

Edited January 11, 2015 by BogusHype
Morce concise per forum rules. Please change Title.

New title: In game achievements/Unlocks: Launch Music

I was launching a while ago and I though about some of the movies about rockets launching and that gave me the idea.

After your first successful (unaided) orbit, a setting would unlock, Enabling Rock and Roll remix of some of the music that is already in the game.

Please no, it's already an arcade game, you can just play your own music.
